DESCRIPTION: Creatures are Afflicted when they are both #yVulnerable and #yWeak.
Doomed creatures lose HP at the start of their turn, then Doom is removed #bunless the creature is #yAfflicted (has both #yWeak and #yVulnerable [REMOVE_SPACE]).
Requires exhausting a card in hand in addition to paying its energy cost.
An alternate type of Energy that is stored across turns.
Megathereal cards move to the exhaust pile when played and at the end of your turn, no matter where they are.
While you have #yTemporary #yHP, each Attack you play triggers Torchhead.
Collectible cards will become unavailable for use in combats after a certain number of combats completed.
Bonus effect which triggers if you have played a different Bandit Boost card this combat.
When drawn from the Collection, draw as many more Shape Swarm cards from your Collection as possible.
When you next play a different Gremlin Gang card this combat, play a copy of this.
Once per combat, if you play all 3 unique Slaver Trio cards, gain 2 Strength and Dexterity.
